DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect vary spinal cord stimulation program parameter , include stimulation rate , pain intensity .
DOC.brief_title: High Rate Spinal Cord Stimulation ( SCS ) Chronic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare effect high-rate subperception stimulation effect low-rate subperception stimulation pain intensity .
DOC.criteria: Chronic intractable pain trunk and/or limb Documented history trunk and/or limb pain least 180 day Average back pain intensity 5 great 010 numerical rating scale 7day period prior Screening Visit Pass study site 's routine psychological/psychiatric evaluation within 180 day Trial Lead Insertion Visit If take medication chronic pain , must stable prescription 14day period prior Trial Lead Insertion Visit agree continue prescription throughout study participation Subject willing able comply protocolrequired procedure assessments/evaluations Subject able independently read complete questionnaire and/or assessment provide English 18 year age old write informed consent obtain Subject sign valid , Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve informed consent form ( ICF ) provide English Unable operate Precision Plus system Primary source pain cancerrelated , pelvic , visceral , angina , migraine Is high surgical risk Is diabetic Is immunocompromised Currently anticoagulant medication discontinue perioperative period Untreated major depression untreated generalized anxiety disorder Diagnosed somatoform disorder , severe personality disorder , borderline personality disorder Diagnosed major psychiatric disorder specifically list CE7 CE8 Currently diagnose cognitive impairment would limit subject 's ability discern difference pain severity , complete pain diary , perform wound care Current abuse alcohol illicit drug Subject require Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) implant lead ( ) . Subject participating ( intend participate ) another drug device clinical trial may influence data collect study Subject previously undergo spinal cord stimulation trial already implant active implantable device ( ) treat pain ( Implantable Pulse Generators ( IPGs ) , implantable drug pump , etc . ) pacemaker implantable cardiac defibrillator Patient woman use adequate contraception , pregnant breastfeeding intend become pregnant course study ( urine pregnancy test must perform within 28 day prior Trial Lead Insertion Visit woman childbearing potential test result document )
